reviews.review_msg: This has been my favourite prof at SFU and my highest grade received. It is easy to get over 100% on exams if you study the study guides and practice questions (there r bonus questions on all exams). Very caring, class is engaging and interesting content. Take this class/prof if you want a GPA booster!

Jen-Li is an amazing prof. She cares about her students and is super clear about what is going to be on exams. She offers bonus points for lecture and tutorial attendance too, and she brings in guest speakers to make the class engaging. Would definitely take her again.

Not enough words to express how good this class was, I 100/10 recommend taking it. Jen-Li was super caring about her students, made an 8:30am class engaging and was very clear about expectations for the exam and term paper. I'd definitely take a class with her again!

amazing prof, you can really tell she cares about her students! i found her lectures concise and engaging. tests were also pretty fair with lots of MC & written questions. warning for those who hate group projects: there's a group presentation done in tutorial. i found the guest lectures hard to follow & take notes on tho & thats testable

Great prof. Lectures are easy to follow, brings in guest lectures, and gives extra marks if you come to lecture. Exams are easy if you study the lecture notes. Prof is transparent about what will be on exams. Paper wasn't too bad, and the group project was easy as well. Very interesting course about corrections. 10/10 - Highly recommend!

Griffiths is passionate about his work. Even whilst taking an online course, you can see how much effort he puts in to educate students. If you take this course online, just make sure you answer the study questions per unit and you will do fine.

Pretty good course. Three papers (2,000 - 2,500 words each) with very clear criteria. Final exam was 40 MC and 10 SA questions based on the study questions. You were given 20 SA questions and only had to answer 10. The audio lectures were quite interesting as well.
Make sure you attend class and pay attention to videos and tutorial readings. Lectures are quite repetitive and boring.

a bit opinionated, but overall he is a good prof. no laptops allowed in class & no ppt slides are posted so you MUST go to class to take notes. a lot of his short answer questions on exams are from his lectures but mc questions are from his text.  this class is interesting, but too many videos are played during lectures so he doesnt teach sometimes

Can't think of a bad thing to say. He's smart, articulate, calculated, and his tests are very fair. His invitation of guest speakers to the classroom is quite useful. I also applaud his enforcement of no technology in the classroom (no use of laptops, cell phones etc), allows for a distraction-free class. He's great, try to take a class with him.

Great prof! very knowledgeable and interested in the topic of corrections. Makes every class interested by using examples from his career, bringing guests and movies. There are a couple of field trips in this class that are great. Very recommended.
He is good

The class itself is amazing, field trips and guest speakers are an unforgettable experience. Curt never taught much though and when he did it was all about the parole board he is on and not corrections specifically. Go to lectures to see guests and take advantage of the trips!
Great class! No papers which was nice! He is a great teacher and the prison trips and class presentations were really helpful! Definitely a class worth taking!
Class was amazing. The field trips to the prisons were the best. Learn stuff that you would like to. Class is sort of boring, but the content and Curt are interesting. I think he has lived a lot.
Great proff. Used interesting speakers videos and field trips to teach the matterial. You learned with out meaning to it was one of the best expiriences
he is a good prof, exams were fair, but the book was boring. The field trips were amazing, I had the best time ever, learned a lot of different perspectives. he knows his stuff!
awesome field trips. midterms are fair and NO presentation or paper. Just great teacher who knows his stuff.
He wrote the book in this class, so he knows everything in it...no fooling. easy class, everything straight forward. fieldtrips very infomative.  He uses many methods of teaching, thus very useful.
best prof i ever had!!!! easy course
He has a good sense of humour and he knows a lot about Corrections. Course material is basic and straightford. Tests are straightford as well.
One of the best profs I've ever had - interesting, dynamic, and a great teacher.  Highly recommended!
never around so hard to reach; overworks the TA; intimidating and explosive
Very nice and he made the class very interesting.  The field trips were awsome and his tests were easy as long as you read the text
he's alright! good presenter~~~
No Comments
a good teacher, very nice
